pergunta: Wait, the example given in the user's sample includes "Quais são os dois tipos diferentes de imunidade?
resposta: imunidade humoral versus imunidade mediada por células." So that's humoral and cellular. But the context says "adaptive (or acquired) immunity creates an immunological memory." So humoral (antibodies) and cellular (T cells) are the two types. So perhaps the question should be about the two types of adaptive immunity.
